name: Kaspar i Nudådalen
storyline: 8-year-old Kaspar lives in a small house with his grandfather in the Norrland village of Nudådalen. Kaspar is a philosophizing little boy, pondering both big and small. Kaspar plays with his best friend Lisa during the day and accompanies grandpa on pranks, as the school has closed due to both water damage and an avalanche.
summary: Kaspar i Nudådalen is a Swedish adventure/puzzle game based on the Christmas calender TV show of the same name. The game has 24 mini-games that are unlocked with a code that was revealed on TV after that day's episode of the Christmas calendar ("Julkalendern").
